text: Obezdolennyye zhe skazhut zanimavshim vysokoye polozheniye: "Net! Eto vashi dnevnyye i nochnyye kozni [sovratili nas], kogda vy veleli nam ne verit' v Allakha i poklonyat'sya drugim bogam naryadu s Nim". No kogda ikh postiglo nakazaniye, oni utaili raskayaniye. My zhe nalozhili okovy na shei nevernykh. Ne za to li vozdayetsya im, chto vershili oni
